TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FileCreationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode Append = int32(32768)

summary.para: File creation mode: for use with , if the file already exists then write data to the end of the existing file instead of erasing it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode EnableWriteAheadLogging = int32(8)

summary.para: Database open flag: when set, the database is opened with write-ahead logging enabled by default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode MultiProcess = int32(4)

summary.para: This was the legacy (but undocumented) behavior in and before Gingerbread (Android 2.3) and this flag is implied when targetting such releases. For applications targetting SDK versions greater than Android 2.3, this flag must be explicitly set if desired.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode Private = int32(0)

summary.para: File creation mode: the default mode, where the created file can only be accessed by the calling application (or all applications sharing the same user ID).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode WorldReadable = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.FileCreationMode WorldWriteable = int32(2)
